Module.Name: PBK model parametrisations
Module.Description: The parametrisation of PBK models are specified as data. PBK models relate exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes (oral, dermal, inhalation) to an internal target or biological matrix. PBK models are based on differential-equation. MCRA currently includes the EuroMix generic PBK model and the bisphenol model of ETHZ. The corresponding exposure in the biological matrix is referred to as internal concentration.
Module.ShortDescription: The parametrisations of PBK models and kinetic model instances are uploaded as data. PBK models convert exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes or compartments to an internal target or biological matrix using physiological based kinetic models (PBK).
Module.DataDescription: Specify kinetic instances of PBK models and their parametrisations as data.
